variables.input:
fetch dt.entity.service
| append [data record(id="no data")]
| fields id

fetch dt.entity.process_group
| append [data record(id="no data")]
| fields id

fetch dt.entity.host
| append [data record(id="no data")]
| fields id

fetch dt.entity.service
| filter matchesPhrase(called_by[dt.entity.application],"APPLICATION")
| expand appid=called_by[dt.entity.application]
| dedup appid
| fields appid
| append [data record(appid="no data")]

fetch dt.entity.service
| filter matchesPhrase(called_by[dt.entity.application],"APPLICATION")
| expand appid=called_by[dt.entity.application]
| fields appid
| join [
    fetch dt.entity.synthetic_test
    | fieldsAdd appid=manuallyAssignedApplications
    | expand appid
   ], on:{appid}, kind:inner
| fields synthid=right.id
| append [data record(synthid="no data")]

fetch dt.entity.service
| filter matchesPhrase(called_by[dt.entity.application],"APPLICATION")
| expand appid=called_by[dt.entity.application]
| fields appid
| join [
    fetch dt.entity.http_check
    | fieldsAdd appid=manuallyAssignedApplications
    | expand appid
   ], on:{appid}, kind:inner
| fields synthid=right.id
| append [data record(synthid="no data")]

fetch dt.entity.service
| filter matchesPhrase(called_by[dt.entity.custom_application],"APPLICATION")
| expand appid=called_by[dt.entity.custom_application]
| dedup appid
| fields appid
| append [data record(appid="no data")]

fetch dt.entity.service
| filter matchesPhrase(called_by[dt.entity.mobile_application],"APPLICATION")
| expand appid=called_by[dt.entity.mobile_application]
| dedup appid
| fields appid
| append [data record(appid="no data")]

fetch dt.entity.cloud_application
| append [data record(id="no data")]
| fields id

fetch dt.entity.cloud_application_instance
| append [data record(id="no data")]
| fields id

fetch dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace
| append [data record(id="no data")]
| fields id

fetch dt.entity.service
| filter matchesPhrase(called_by[dt.entity.application],"APPLICATION")
| expand appid=called_by[dt.entity.application]
| fields appid
| join [
   fetch dt.entity.application_method
   | fieldsAdd appid=belongs_to[dt.entity.application]
   ], on:{appid}, kind:inner
| fields uaid=right.id
| append [data record(uaid="no data")]

fetch dt.entity.service
| filter matchesPhrase(called_by[dt.entity.mobile_application],"APPLICATION")
| expand appid=called_by[dt.entity.mobile_application]
| fields appid
| join [
   fetch dt.entity.device_application_method
   | fieldsAdd appid=belongs_to[dt.entity.mobile_application]
   ], on:{appid}, kind:inner
| fields uaid=right.id
| append [data record(uaid="no data")]

fetch dt.entity.service
| filter matchesPhrase(called_by[dt.entity.application],"APPLICATION") or matchesPhrase(called_by[dt.entity.mobile_application],"APPLICATION") or matchesPhrase(called_by[dt.entity.custom_application],"APPLICATION")
| fields id
| append [data record(id="no data")]

fetch dt.entity.application
| append [data record(id="no data")]
| fields id

fetch dt.entity.mobile_application
| append [data record(id="no data")]
| fields id

fetch dt.entity.custom_application
| append [data record(id="no data")]
| fields id

fetch dt.entity.device_application_method
| append [data record(id="no data")]
| fields id

fetch dt.entity.application_method
| append [data record(id="no data")]
| fields id

fetch dt.entity.http_check
| append [data record(id="no data")]
| fields id

fetch dt.entity.synthetic_test
| append [data record(id="no data")]
| fields id

fetch dt.entity.service
| filter isNotNull(databaseName)
| fields id
| append [data record(id="no data")]

fetch dt.entity.custom_device
| fields id
| append [data record(id="no data")]

fetch dt.entity.gcp_zone
| filter matchesValue(contains[dt.entity.host],$host)
| append [data record(id="no data")]
| fields id

fetch dt.entity.aws_availability_zone
| filter matchesValue(contains[dt.entity.host],$host)
| append [data record(id="no data")]
| fields id

fetch dt.entity.vmware_datacenter
| filter matchesValue(contains[dt.entity.host],$host)
| append [data record(id="no data")]
| fields id

fetch dt.entity.azure_region
| filter matchesValue(contains[dt.entity.host],$host)
| append [data record(id="no data")]
| fields id

0.title: Response time
0.query:
data record(dt.entity.service=array($service))
| expand dt.entity.service
| filterOut dt.entity.service=="no data"
| join [
	timeseries resp_time=avg(dt.service.request.response_time, default: 0), nonempty:true, by:{dt.entity.service}, filter:{ matchesValue(dt.entity.service, array($service))}
    ], on:{dt.entity.service}, kind:leftOuter, prefix: "metric."
| filterOut isNull(metric.timeframe)
| fieldsAdd  entity.name=entityName(dt.entity.service)
| fieldsRemove metric.dt.entity.service
| fieldsRename resp_time=metric.resp_time
| sort arrayAvg(resp_time) desc
| limit toLong($top)

4.query:
//id=dt.entity.process_group, variable=$process_group 
data record(dt.entity.process_group=array($process_group))
| expand dt.entity.process_group
| filterOut dt.entity.process_group=="no data"
| join [
    fetch dt.davis.problems
    | filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and matchesValue(affected_entity_ids,array($process_group))
    | expand affected_entity_ids
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, display_id, event.id
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, event.status
    | fields dt.entity.process_group=affected_entity_ids,  status=if(event.status =="ACTIVE","🔴", else: "🟡"), display_id, event.id
    ], on: { dt.entity.process_group }, kind:leftOuter
| fieldsAdd status=if(isNotNull(right.status),right.status, else: "🟢" ), event.id=right.event.id
| join [
	timeseries {cpu=avg(dt.process.cpu.usage), mem=avg(dt.process.memory.usage)}, by:{dt.entity.process_group}, filter:{ matchesValue(dt.entity.process_group, array($process_group))}
	| fields timeframe, interval, dt.entity.process_group, cpu, mem
	| summarize {cpu.avg = avg(arrayAvg(cpu)),mem.avg = avg(arrayAvg(mem))}, by:{dt.entity.process_group}
    ], on: { dt.entity.process_group }, kind:leftOuter, prefix: "metric."
| fields entity.name=entityName(dt.entity.process_group), status, cpu.usage=metric.cpu.avg, mem.usage=metric.cpu.avg, `latest pb`=if(isNotNull(right.display_id),right.display_id, else : ""), event.id=right.event.id,  dt.entity.process_group
| sort status, cpu.usage desc
| limit toLong($top)

5.title: Process group
5.query:
//id=dt.entity.process_group, variable=$process_group 
data record(dt.entity.process_group=array($process_group))
| expand dt.entity.process_group
| filterOut dt.entity.process_group=="no data"
| join [
    fetch dt.davis.problems
    | filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and matchesValue(affected_entity_ids,array($process_group))
    | expand affected_entity_ids
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, display_id, event.id
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, event.status
    | fields dt.entity.process_group=affected_entity_ids,  status=if(event.status =="ACTIVE","🔴", else: "🟡"), display_id, event.id
    ], on: { dt.entity.process_group }, kind:leftOuter
| fieldsAdd status=if(isNotNull(right.status),right.status, else: "🟢" ), event.id=right.event.id
| fields status, entity.name=entityNAme(dt.entity.process_group), dt.entity.process_group
| sort status
| limit toLong($top)

16.query:
//id=dt.entity.service, variable=$service 
data record(dt.entity.service=array($service))
| expand dt.entity.service
| filterOut dt.entity.service=="no data"
| join [
    fetch dt.davis.problems
    | filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and matchesValue(affected_entity_ids,array($service))
    | expand affected_entity_ids
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, display_id, event.id
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, event.status
    | fields dt.entity.service=affected_entity_ids,  status=if(event.status =="ACTIVE","🔴", else: "🟡"), display_id, event.id
    ], on: { dt.entity.service }, kind:leftOuter
| fieldsAdd status=if(isNotNull(right.status),right.status, else: "🟢" ), event.id=right.event.id
| join [
	timeseries {resp_time=avg(dt.service.request.response_time), failure_count=sum(dt.service.request.failure_count), count=sum(dt.service.request.count)}, by:{dt.entity.service}, filter:{ matchesValue(dt.entity.service, array($service))}
	| fields timeframe,interval, dt.entity.service, resp_time, failure_count, count
	| summarize {resp_time = avg(arrayAvg(resp_time)), failure_count = sum(arraySum(failure_count)), count=sum(arraySum(count))}, by:{dt.entity.service}
    ], on:{dt.entity.service}, kind:leftOuter, prefix:"metric."
|join[
    data record(dt.entity.service=array($entry_point))
    | expand dt.entity.service
    | filterOut dt.entity.service=="no data"
    ], on:{dt.entity.service}, kind:leftOuter, prefix:"ep."
|join[
    data record(dt.entity.service=array($database))
    | expand dt.entity.service
    | filterOut dt.entity.service=="no data"
    ], on:{dt.entity.service}, kind:leftOuter, prefix:"db."
| fieldsAdd entry_point=if(isNotNull(ep.dt.entity.service),"➡️",else : "")
| fieldsAdd database=if(isNotNull(db.dt.entity.service),"db",else : "")
| fields entity.name=entityName(dt.entity.service), status, type=concat(entry_point,database), resp_time=metric.resp_time, failure=metric.failure_count, request=metric.count, `latest pb`=if(isNotNull(right.display_id),right.display_id, else : ""), event.id=right.event.id, dt.entity.service
| sort status, type desc, resp_time desc
| limit toLong($top)

17.title: Service

| expand dt.entity.service

    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, display_id, event.id
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, event.status
    | fields dt.entity.service=affected_entity_ids,  status=if(event.status =="ACTIVE","🔴", else: "🟡"), display_id, event.id
    ], on: { dt.entity.service }, kind:leftOuter
| fieldsAdd status=if(isNotNull(right.status),right.status, else: "🟢" ), event.id=right.event.id
| fields status, entity.name=entityNAme(dt.entity.service), dt.entity.service
| sort status
| limit toLong($top)

18.title: Failure
18.query:
data record(dt.entity.service=array($service))
| expand dt.entity.service
| filterOut dt.entity.service=="no data"
| join [
	timeseries failure=sum(dt.service.request.failure_count, default: 0), nonempty:true, by:{dt.entity.service}, filter:{ matchesValue(dt.entity.service, array($service))}
    ], on:{dt.entity.service}, kind:leftOuter, prefix: "metric."
| filterOut isNull(metric.timeframe)
| fieldsAdd  entity.name=entityName(dt.entity.service)
| fieldsRemove metric.dt.entity.service
| fieldsRename failure=metric.failure
| sort arraySum(failure) desc
| limit toLong($top)

19.title: Throughput
19.query:
data record(dt.entity.service=array($service))
| expand dt.entity.service
| filterOut dt.entity.service=="no data"
| join [
	timeseries count=sum(dt.service.request.count, default: 0), nonempty:true, by:{dt.entity.service}, filter:{ matchesValue(dt.entity.service, array($service))}
    ], on:{dt.entity.service}, kind:leftOuter, prefix: "metric."
| filterOut isNull(metric.timeframe)
| fieldsAdd  entity.name=entityName(dt.entity.service)
| fieldsRemove metric.dt.entity.service
| fieldsRename request=metric.count
| sort arraySum(request) desc
| limit toLong($top)

23.query:
//concat
//id=dt.entity.application, variable=$application_from_service 
//id=dt.entity.mobile_application, variable=$amobile_pplication 
//id=dt.entity.custom_pplication, variable=$custom_application_from_service 
data record(dt.entity.application=ArrayConcat(array($application),array($mobile_application),array($custom_application),array($application_from_service),array($mobile_application_from_service),array($custom_application_from_service)))
| expand dt.entity.application
| dedup dt.entity.application
| filterOut dt.entity.application=="no data"
| parse dt.entity.application, """LD:type '-'LD"""
| join [
    fetch dt.davis.problems
    | filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and (matchesValue(affected_entity_ids,array($application)) or matchesValue(affected_entity_ids,array($custom_application)) or matchesValue(affected_entity_ids,array($mobile_application)) or matchesValue(affected_entity_ids,array($application_from_service)) or matchesValue(affected_entity_ids,array($custom_application_from_service)) or matchesValue(affected_entity_ids,array($mobile_application_from_service)))
    | expand affected_entity_ids
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, display_id, event.id
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, event.status
    | fields dt.entity.application=affected_entity_ids,  status=if(event.status =="ACTIVE","🔴", else: "🟡"), display_id, event.id
    ], on: { dt.entity.application }, kind:leftOuter
| fieldsAdd name_app=if(type=="APPLICATION", entityName(dt.entity.application, type:"dt.entity.application"), else: "")
| fieldsAdd name_mob=if(type=="MOBILE_APPLICATION", entityName(dt.entity.application, type:"dt.entity.mobile_application"), else: "")
| fieldsAdd name_cust=if(type=="CUSTOM_APPLICATION", entityName(dt.entity.application, type:"dt.entity.custom_application"), else: "")
| fieldsAdd type_app=if(type=="APPLICATION", "web", else: "")
| fieldsAdd type_mob=if(type=="MOBILE_APPLICATION", "mobile", else: "")
| fieldsAdd type_cust=if(type=="CUSTOM_APPLICATION", "custom", else: "")
| fieldsAdd entity.name=concat(name_app,name_mob,name_cust), entity.type=concat(type_app,type_mob,type_cust)
| fieldsAdd status=if(isNotNull(right.status),right.status, else: "🟢" ), event.id=right.event.id
| fields entity.name, status, entity.type, `latest pb`=if(isNotNull(right.display_id),right.display_id, else : ""), event.id=right.event.id, dt.entity.application
| sort status
| limit toLong($top)

24.title: Application
24.query:
//concat
//id=dt.entity.application, variable=$application_from_service 
//id=dt.entity.mobile_application, variable=$amobile_pplication 
//id=dt.entity.custom_pplication, variable=$custom_application_from_service 
data record(dt.entity.application=ArrayConcat(array($application),array($mobile_application),array($custom_application),array($application_from_service),array($mobile_application_from_service),array($custom_application_from_service)))
| expand dt.entity.application

| join [
    fetch dt.davis.problems
    | filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and (matchesValue(affected_entity_ids,array($application)) or matchesValue(affected_entity_ids,array($custom_application)) or matchesValue(affected_entity_ids,array($mobile_application)) or matchesValue(affected_entity_ids,array($application_from_service)) or matchesValue(affected_entity_ids,array($custom_application_from_service)) or matchesValue(affected_entity_ids,array($mobile_application_from_service)))
    | expand affected_entity_ids
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, display_id, event.id
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, event.status
    | fields dt.entity.application=affected_entity_ids,  status=if(event.status =="ACTIVE","🔴", else: "🟡"), display_id, event.id
    ], on: { dt.entity.application }, kind:leftOuter
| fieldsAdd name_app=if(type=="APPLICATION", entityName(dt.entity.application, type:"dt.entity.application"), else: "")
| fieldsAdd name_mob=if(type=="MOBILE_APPLICATION", entityName(dt.entity.application, type:"dt.entity.mobile_application"), else: "")
| fieldsAdd name_cust=if(type=="CUSTOM_APPLICATION", entityName(dt.entity.application, type:"dt.entity.custom_application"), else: "")
| fieldsAdd entity.name=concat(name_app,name_mob,name_cust)
| fieldsAdd status=if(isNotNull(right.status),right.status, else: "🟢" ), event.id=right.event.id
| fields status, entity.name, dt.entity.application
| sort status
| limit toLong($top)

27.query:
//concat :
//id=dt.entity.synthetic_test, variable=$synthetic_test_from_service 
//id=dt.entity.http_check, variable=$http_check_from_service 
data record(dt.entity.synthetic=ArrayConcat(array($synthetic_test),array($http_check),array($synthetic_test_from_service),array($http_check_from_service)))
| expand dt.entity.synthetic
| dedup dt.entity.synthetic
| filterOut dt.entity.synthetic=="no data"
| parse dt.entity.synthetic, """LD:type '-'LD"""
| join [
    fetch dt.davis.problems
    | filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and (matchesValue(affected_entity_ids,array($synthetic_test)) or matchesValue(affected_entity_ids,array($http_check)) or matchesValue(affected_entity_ids,array($synthetic_test_from_service)) or matchesValue(affected_entity_ids,array($http_check_from_service)))
    | expand affected_entity_ids
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, display_id, event.id
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, event.status
    | fields dt.entity.synthetic=affected_entity_ids,  status=if(event.status =="ACTIVE","🔴", else: "🟡"), display_id, event.id
    ], on: { dt.entity.synthetic }, kind:leftOuter
| fieldsAdd name_synth=if(type=="SYNTHETIC_TEST", entityName(dt.entity.synthetic, type:"dt.entity.synthetic_test"), else: "")
| fieldsAdd name_http=if(type=="HTTP_CHECK", entityName(dt.entity.synthetic, type:"dt.entity.http_check"), else: "")
| fieldsAdd type_synth=if(type=="SYNTHETIC_TEST", "browser monitor", else: "")
| fieldsAdd type_http=if(type=="HTTP_CHECK", "http check", else: "")
| fieldsAdd entity.name=concat(name_synth,name_http), entity.type=concat(type_synth,type_http)
| fieldsAdd status=if(isNotNull(right.status),right.status, else: "🟢" ), event.id=right.event.id
| fields entity.name, status, entity.type, `latest pb`=if(isNotNull(right.display_id),right.display_id, else : ""), event.id=right.event.id, dt.entity.synthetic_test=dt.entity.synthetic
| sort status
| limit toLong($top)

34.query:
//id=dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace, variable=$cloud_application_namespace 
data record(dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace=array($cloud_application_namespace))
| expand dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace
| filterOut dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace=="no data"
| join [
    fetch dt.davis.problems
    | filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and matchesValue(affected_entity_ids,array($cloud_application_namespace))
    | expand affected_entity_ids
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, display_id, event.id
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, event.status
    | fields dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace=affected_entity_ids,  status=if(event.status =="ACTIVE","🔴", else: "🟡"), display_id, event.id
    ], on: { dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace }, kind:leftOuter
| fieldsAdd status=if(isNotNull(right.status),right.status, else: "🟢" ), event.id=right.event.id
| join [
    timeseries {cpu.usage=sum(dt.kubernetes.container.cpu_usage, default:0, rollup:avg), mem.usage=sum(dt.kubernetes.container.memory_working_set, default:0, rollup:avg)}, by:{dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace}, filter:{ matchesValue(dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace, array($cloud_application_namespace))}
	| fields timeframe, interval, dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace, cpu.usage, mem.usage
	| summarize {cpu.usage = avg(arrayAvg(cpu.usage)), mem.usage = avg(arrayAvg(mem.usage))}, by:{dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace}
    ], on: { dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace }, kind:leftOuter, prefix: "metric."
| fields  entity.name=entityName(dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace), status, cpu.usage=metric.cpu.usage, mem.usage=metric.mem.usage, `latest pb`=if(isNotNull(right.display_id),right.display_id, else : ""), event.id=right.event.id, dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace
| sort status, cpu.usage desc
| limit toLong($top)

| join [
    timeseries {cpu.usage=sum(dt.kubernetes.container.cpu_usage, default:0, rollup:avg), mem.usage=sum(dt.kubernetes.container.memory_working_set, default:0, rollup:avg)}, by:{dt.entity.cloud_application_instance}, filter:{ matchesValue(dt.entity.cloud_application_instance, array($cloud_application_instance))}
	| fields timeframe, interval, dt.entity.cloud_application_instance, cpu.usage, mem.usage
	| summarize {cpu.usage = avg(arrayAvg(cpu.usage)), mem.usage = avg(arrayAvg(mem.usage))}, by:{dt.entity.cloud_application_instance}
    ], on: { dt.entity.cloud_application_instance }, kind:leftOuter, prefix: "metric."
| fields  entity.name=entityName(dt.entity.cloud_application_instance), status, cpu.usage=metric.cpu.usage, mem.usage=metric.mem.usage, `latest pb`=if(isNotNull(right.display_id),right.display_id, else : ""), event.id=right.event.id, dt.entity.cloud_application_instance
| sort status, cpu.usage desc
| limit toLong($top)

41.title: Pod

    fetch dt.davis.problems
    | filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and matchesValue(affected_entity_ids,array($cloud_application_instance))
    | expand affected_entity_ids
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, display_id, event.id
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, event.status
    | fields dt.entity.cloud_application_instance=affected_entity_ids,  status=if(event.status =="ACTIVE","🔴", else: "🟡"), display_id, event.id
    ], on: { dt.entity.cloud_application_instance }, kind:leftOuter
| fieldsAdd status=if(isNotNull(right.status),right.status, else: "🟢" ), event.id=right.event.id

52.query:
//id=dt.entity.host, variable=$host 
data record(dt.entity.host=array($host))
| expand dt.entity.host
| filterOut dt.entity.host=="no data"
| join [
    fetch dt.davis.problems
    | filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and matchesValue(affected_entity_ids,array($host))
    | expand affected_entity_ids
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, display_id, event.id
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, event.status
    | fields dt.entity.host=affected_entity_ids,  status=if(event.status =="ACTIVE","🔴", else: "🟡"), display_id, event.id
    ], on: { dt.entity.host }, kind:leftOuter
| fieldsAdd status=if(isNotNull(right.status),right.status, else: "🟢" ), event.id=right.event.id
| join [
	timeseries {cpu=avg(dt.host.cpu.usage), mem=avg(dt.host.memory.usage)}, by:{dt.entity.host}, filter:{ matchesValue(dt.entity.host, array($host))}
	| fields timeframe, interval, dt.entity.host, cpu, mem
	| summarize {cpu.avg = avg(arrayAvg(cpu)), mem.avg = avg(arrayAvg(mem))}, by:{dt.entity.host}
    ], on: { dt.entity.host }, kind:leftOuter, prefix: "metric."
| fields entity.name=entityName(dt.entity.host), status, cpu.usage=metric.cpu.avg, mem.usage=metric.mem.avg,`latest pb`=if(isNotNull(right.display_id),right.display_id, else : ""), event.id=right.event.id, dt.entity.host

60.query:
//concat :
//id=dt.entity.application_method, variable=$application_method_from_service 
//id=dt.entity.device_application_method, variable=$device_application_method_from_service 
data record(dt.entity.user_action=ArrayConcat(array($application_method),array($device_application_method),array($application_method_from_service),array($device_application_method_from_service)))
| expand dt.entity.user_action
| dedup dt.entity.user_action
| filterOut dt.entity.user_action=="no data"
| parse dt.entity.user_action, """LD:type '-'LD"""
| join [
    fetch dt.davis.problems
    | filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and (matchesValue(affected_entity_ids,array($application_method)) or matchesValue(affected_entity_ids,array($device_application_method)) or matchesValue(affected_entity_ids,array($application_method_from_service)) or matchesValue(affected_entity_ids,array($device_application_method_from_service)))
    | expand affected_entity_ids
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, display_id, event.id
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, event.status
    | fields dt.entity.user_action=affected_entity_ids,  status=if(event.status =="ACTIVE","🔴", else: "🟡"), display_id, event.id
    ], on: { dt.entity.user_action }, kind:leftOuter
| fieldsAdd ua_web=if(type=="APPLICATION_METHOD", entityName(dt.entity.user_action, type:"dt.entity.application_method"), else: "")
| fieldsAdd ua_mobile=if(type=="DEVICE_APPLICATION_METHOD", entityName(dt.entity.user_action, type:"dt.entity.device_application_method"), else: "")
| fieldsAdd type_web=if(type=="APPLICATION_METHOD", "web", else: "")
| fieldsAdd type_mobile=if(type=="DEVICE_APPLICATION_METHOD", "mobile", else: "")
| fieldsAdd entity.name=concat(ua_web,ua_mobile), entity.type=concat(type_web,type_mobile)
| fieldsAdd status=if(isNotNull(right.status),right.status, else: "🟢" ), event.id=right.event.id
| fields entity.name, status, entity.type, `latest pb`=if(isNotNull(right.display_id),right.display_id, else : ""), event.id=right.event.id, dt.entity.application_method=dt.entity.user_action
| sort status
| limit toLong($top)

79.query:
//concat
//id=dt.entity.gcp_zone, variable=$gcp_zone 
//id=dt.entity.aws_availability_zone, variable=$amobile_pplication 
//id=dt.entity.custom_pplication, variable=$azure_region 
data record(dt.entity.cloud=ArrayConcat(array($gcp_zone),array($aws_availability_zone),array($azure_region)))
| expand dt.entity.cloud
| dedup dt.entity.cloud
| filterOut dt.entity.cloud=="no data"
| parse dt.entity.cloud, """LD:type '-'LD"""
| join [
    fetch dt.davis.problems
    | filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and (matchesValue(affected_entity_ids,array($gcp_zone)) or matchesValue(affected_entity_ids,array($azure_region)) or matchesValue(affected_entity_ids,array($aws_availability_zone)))
    | expand affected_entity_ids
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, display_id, event.id
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, event.status
    | fields dt.entity.cloud=affected_entity_ids,  status=if(event.status =="ACTIVE","🔴", else: "🟡"), display_id, event.id
    ], on: { dt.entity.cloud }, kind:leftOuter
| fieldsAdd name_gcp=if(type=="GCP_ZONE", entityName(dt.entity.cloud, type:"dt.entity.gcp_zone"), else: "")
| fieldsAdd name_aws=if(type=="AWS_AVAILABILITY_ZONE", entityName(dt.entity.cloud, type:"dt.entity.aws_availability_zone"), else: "")
| fieldsAdd name_azure=if(type=="AZURE_REGION", entityName(dt.entity.cloud, type:"dt.entity.azure_region"), else: "")
| fieldsAdd type_gcp=if(type=="GCP_ZONE", "gcp", else: "")
| fieldsAdd type_aws=if(type=="AWS_AVAILABILITY_ZONE", "aws", else: "")
| fieldsAdd type_azure=if(type=="AZURE_REGION", "azure", else: "")
| fieldsAdd dt.entity.gcp_zone=if(type=="GCP_ZONE", dt.entity.cloud, else: "")
| fieldsAdd dt.entity.aws_availability_zone=if(type=="AWS_AVAILABILITY_ZONE", dt.entity.cloud, else: "")
| fieldsAdd dt.entity.azure_region=if(type=="AZURE_REGION", dt.entity.cloud, else: "")
  | fieldsAdd entity.name=concat(name_gcp,name_aws,name_azure), entity.type=concat(type_gcp,type_aws,type_azure)
| fieldsAdd status=if(isNotNull(right.status),right.status, else: "🟢" ), event.id=right.event.id
| fields entity.name, status, entity.type, `latest pb`=if(isNotNull(right.display_id),right.display_id, else : ""), event.id=right.event.id, dt.entity.gcp_zone, dt.entity.aws_availability_zone, dt.entity.azure_region
| sort status
| limit toLong($top)

86.content: Simply Smarter release version 0.3 - latest version [here](https://github.com/dynatrace-ace-services/simply_smarter_4_platform)
